nodes.text: Near-Duros were species that had evolved in slightly different directions to base-line Duros due to living in isolation from other Duros for many thousands of years. This was often as a result of adapting to different environments. The most well-known of the Near-Duros species were the Neimoidians.
A yellow-skinned Duros, which may have been a near-Duros, appeared in Star Wars 79.
